comment: The left group action of element ` A ` of group ` G ` maps the underlying set ` X ` of ` G ` one-to-one onto itself. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 18-Mar-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
